title: I was attacked at work last night. I'm not kidding.
body:
My neck has a cut on the back, right under the hairline, my arm got a cut, too. But I'm mostly ok, just rattled. 

Long story short, the guy asked for hot sauce with his order, I told him we were out, he got mad, words were exchanged, he threatened to come over the counter and attack me, then followed through. He grabbed me by the shirt, pushed me to the wall, and flipped me over onto the ground and started punching. I managed to get out after kicking him in the groin, then multiple people called 911 and he was arrested.

This is what customer service people have to deal with, folks. We get assaulted over hot sauce.
